entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:53 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
